languages.text: {n}Здесь явно замешана омофагия — генетический дар, полученный Астартес от Императора. Этот орган соединяет мозг и желудок десантника, позволяя усваивать информацию из генетического кода поглощаемой пищи.{/n}

{n}The omophagea is clearly involved here — the genetic gift granted to the Astartes by the Emperor. This organ links the brain and stomach of a Space Marine, allowing him to absorb information from the genetic code of any flesh he consumes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Здесь явно замешана омофагия — генетический дар, полученный Астартес от Императора. Этот орган соединяет мозг и желудок десантника, позволяя усваивать информацию из генетического кода поглощаемой пищи.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The omophagea is clearly involved here — the genetic gift granted to the Astartes by the Emperor. This organ links the brain and stomach of a Space Marine, allowing him to absorb information from the genetic code of any flesh he consumes.{/n}

{n}The omophagea is clearly involved here — the genetic gift granted to the Astartes by the Emperor. This organ links the brain and stomach of a Space Marine, allowing him to absorb information from the genetic code of any flesh he consumes.{/n}

{n}The omophagea is clearly involved here — the genetic gift granted to the Astartes by the Emperor. This organ links the brain and stomach of a Space Marine, allowing him to absorb information from the genetic code of any flesh he consumes.{/n}

{n}The omophagea is clearly involved here — the genetic gift granted to the Astartes by the Emperor. This organ links the brain and stomach of a Space Marine, allowing him to absorb information from the genetic code of any flesh he consumes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}很显然，这就要涉及到基因侦测神经了。基因侦测神经是帝皇赐予阿斯塔特修士的基因礼物，连接着星际战士的大脑与胃。星际战士可以通过吞噬肉体，从食物的基因代码中获取信息。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The omophagea is clearly involved here — the genetic gift granted to the Astartes by the Emperor. This organ links the brain and stomach of a Space Marine, allowing him to absorb information from the genetic code of any flesh he consumes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}很显然，这就要涉及到基因侦测神经了。基因侦测神经是帝皇赐予阿斯塔特修士的基因礼物，连接着星际战士的大脑与胃。星际战士可以通过吞噬肉体，从食物的基因代码中获取信息。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Claramente, el omófago está involucrado. Es el regalo genético concedido a los Astartes por el Emperador. Es un órgano que conecta el cerebro y el estómago de un Marine Espacial, permitiéndole absorber información del código genético de la carne que consume.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The omophagea is clearly involved here — the genetic gift granted to the Astartes by the Emperor. This organ links the brain and stomach of a Space Marine, allowing him to absorb information from the genetic code of any flesh he consumes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Claramente, el omófago está involucrado. Es el regalo genético concedido a los Astartes por el Emperador. Es un órgano que conecta el cerebro y el estómago de un Marine Espacial, permitiéndole absorber información del código genético de la carne que consume.{/n}

languages.text: {n}オモファギア…皇帝がアスタルテスに授けた遺伝子の賜物が彼に埋め込まれているのは明らかだ。この器官はスペースマリーンの脳と胃を結びつけ、摂取した肉の遺伝子コードから情報を吸収することを可能にするのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The omophagea is clearly involved here — the genetic gift granted to the Astartes by the Emperor. This organ links the brain and stomach of a Space Marine, allowing him to absorb information from the genetic code of any flesh he consumes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}オモファギア…皇帝がアスタルテスに授けた遺伝子の賜物が彼に埋め込まれているのは明らかだ。この器官はスペースマリーンの脳と胃を結びつけ、摂取した肉の遺伝子コードから情報を吸収することを可能にするのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Omophagea ist hier eindeutig beteiligt — das genetische Geschenk, das der Imperator den Astartes gewährt hat. Dieses Organ verbindet das Gehirn und den Magen eines Space Marines, so dass er Informationen aus dem genetischen Code des Fleischs absorbieren kann, das er verzehrt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The omophagea is clearly involved here — the genetic gift granted to the Astartes by the Emperor. This organ links the brain and stomach of a Space Marine, allowing him to absorb information from the genetic code of any flesh he consumes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Omophagea ist hier eindeutig beteiligt — das genetische Geschenk, das der Imperator den Astartes gewährt hat. Dieses Organ verbindet das Gehirn und den Magen eines Space Marines, so dass er Informationen aus dem genetischen Code des Fleischs absorbieren kann, das er verzehrt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'omophagea joue clairement un rôle là-dedans. Il s'agit du cadeau génétique offert aux Astartes par l'Empereur. Cet organe relie le cerveau et l'estomac d'un Space Marine, lui permettant d'absorber les informations du code génétique de la chair qu'il ingurgite.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The omophagea is clearly involved here — the genetic gift granted to the Astartes by the Emperor. This organ links the brain and stomach of a Space Marine, allowing him to absorb information from the genetic code of any flesh he consumes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'omophagea joue clairement un rôle là-dedans. Il s'agit du cadeau génétique offert aux Astartes par l'Empereur. Cet organe relie le cerveau et l'estomac d'un Space Marine, lui permettant d'absorber les informations du code génétique de la chair qu'il ingurgite.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Astartes'e İmparator tarafından bahşedilmiş, genetik bir hediye olan omofaji yüzünden olmalı. Bu organ, Uzay Piyadelerinin beyniyle midesini birbirine bağlayarak tükettikleri etin genetik kodundan bilgi edinmelerine olanak sağlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The omophagea is clearly involved here — the genetic gift granted to the Astartes by the Emperor. This organ links the brain and stomach of a Space Marine, allowing him to absorb information from the genetic code of any flesh he consumes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Astartes'e İmparator tarafından bahşedilen genetik bir hediye olan omofaji etkili olmalı. Bu organ, Uzay Piyadelerinin beyniyle midesini birbirine bağlayarak tükettikleri etin genetik kodundan bilgi edinmelerine olanak sağlıyor.{/n}
